survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Corporate Wellness Retreats Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on corporate wellness retreats to assess satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of the corporate wellness retreat?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of the corporate wellness retreat?

questions.question_text: Which activities did you participate in during the retreat? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse participation.

script.question_text: Which activities did you participate in during the retreat? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was the most beneficial aspect of the wellness retreat for you?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights.

script.question_text: What was the most beneficial aspect of the wellness retreat for you?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend future wellness retreats to your colleagues?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend future wellness retreats to your colleagues?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future wellness retreats?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future wellness retreats?
